author: cms-met
body:
Covariance matrix change: Was a bug not to use power of 2. See these plots done with the fix:
![metpfpullx](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5113742/12616151/ec0cfe3e-c509-11e5-8326-ac901e73d83d.png)
![metpfpully](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5113742/12616152/ec0df4f6-c509-11e5-9cc0-f6cf380ac98a.png)
Without the fix the pulls are just way off.

All other things do not change the performance at all but are necessary to make the plugin work due to missing consumes calls before.
title: Update to MVA MET: Fullfills "consumes" call requirement, Bugfix for the calculation of the covariance matrix, updated path to weight files
